com.ibm.team.repository.common.validation

Interface IItemValidator


  • public interface IItemValidator
    Common validator that can be used by clients to validate item properties to ensure the values conform to repository constraints. The constraints are declared in the model, and enforced by the repo server and the database. The validator checks the following constraints:
    • Required properties must not be null
    • Required string properties must not be an empty string
    • String properties should not exceed the size limits (250 UTF-8 encoded bytes for short, 32K UTF-8 encoded bytes for long)

    Validation requests will return an IStatus. When the status is not ok, it (or its children if its an MultiStatus) can be casted to IPropertyConstraintErrorStatus, which also contains status codes and other values that can be tested to determine why an item property is not valid.

    Since:
    0.6
    See Also:
    IPropertyConstraintErrorStatus, IStringSizeConstraintErrorStatus

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IItemValidator INSTANCE
      The single instance to be used by clients

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        static final IItemValidator INSTANCE
        The single instance to be used by clients

    • Method Detail

      • validateAttribute

        org.eclipse.core.runtime.IStatus validateAttribute(IType type,
                                                 java.lang.String propertyName,
                                                 java.lang.Object value)
        Validates the given property to determine if it conforms to the modeled and db storage constraints. Clients can use this for validating string sizes, for example, without needing an entire item.
        Parameters:
        type - the IItemType or IHelperType that owns the property; must not be null
        propertyName - the property; must not be null; must be an attribute property
        value - the property value that should be validated
        Returns:
        IStatus - will be Status.OK_STATUS if the value is valid for the specified property; otherwise will be an instance of IPropertyConstraintErrorStatus
        See Also:
        - base class for all validation errors, - error status used if the UTF-8 encoded size of a string property is too large for the field.

      • validateConstraints

        org.eclipse.core.runtime.IStatus validateConstraints(IItem item)
        Validates an item and all its helpers to determine if all property settings conform to the modeled and db storage constraints. For partial items, only the partial item properties are checked.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to be validated; must not be null
        Returns:
        IStatus indicating the success or failure of the validation. If successful, will be Status.OK_STATUS; otherwise will be a MultiStatus wherein all children are instances of IPropertyConstraintErrorStatus
        See Also:
        - base interface for all validation errors, - error status used if the UTF-8 encoded size of a string property is too large for the field.
